name: StringifyFilter
description: The `StringifyFilter` class is a versatile filter that converts any object to its string representation and then applies string comparison operations against a set of predefined values. This filter is particularly useful when you need to search for objects based on their string properties, such as item names, block identifiers, or any other textual representation of game objects.
overview: As part of JSMacros' WorldScanner filtering system, `StringifyFilter` inherits powerful logical operations from `BasicFilter`, allowing you to combine it with other filters using AND, OR, XOR, and NOT operations to create complex search criteria.

constructors.description: Creates a new `StringifyFilter` with the specified string comparison operation.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: The string comparison operation to use ("CONTAINS", "EQUALS", "STARTS_WITH", "ENDS_WITH", "MATCHES")

methods.name: CONTAINS
methods.description: Checks if the object's string representation contains any of the filter options as substrings.

methods.name: EQUALS
methods.description: Checks if the object's string representation exactly matches any of the filter options.

methods.name: STARTS_WITH
methods.description: Checks if the object's string representation starts with any of the filter options.

methods.name: ENDS_WITH
methods.description: Checks if the object's string representation ends with any of the filter options.

methods.name: MATCHES
methods.description: Checks if the object's string representation matches any of the filter options using regular expressions.
